Jugl.Util

The Jugl.Util namespace contains general utility functions.

Summary
Jugl.Util
The Jugl.Util namespace contains general utility functions.
Functions
extend
Extend one object with properties from another.
indexOf
Get the index of an object in an array
bind
Bind an object to a function.

Functions

extend

Jugl.Util.extend = function(destination,
source)

Extend one object with properties from another.  The original destination object is modified by this method.

Parameters

destination{Object} The object to be modified
source{Object} The object with properties to be added to the destination

Return

{Object} An extended version of the destination object.

indexOf

Jugl.Util.indexOf = function(array,
obj)

Get the index of an object in an array

Parameters

array{Array} The array to search
obj{Object} The object to search for

Return

{Integer} The index of the object in the array.  Returns -1 if not found.

bind

Jugl.Util.bind = function(method,
object)

Bind an object to a function.  If called with more than two arguments, any additional arguments will be prepended to the arguments array when the function is called.

Parameters

method{Function} A function to call with object as this
object{Object} The object that will be named this when function is called

Return

{Function} A function that will refer to the passed in object as this
